name: Among the Dust
description:
AMONG THE DUST: Made in 5 days for Billy's Basement Game Jam

(Theme: Glitched)

It would be highly appreciated if you could rate and leave feedback after playing. A Semi-Simulation of driving a Rover on the surface on a far away planet, dangers and equipment limitations making the daily work a struggle for the pilot. Credits: Zachary Booth [Itch] [SoundCloud] - Sound Designer Pierce Constanti [Itch] [Website] - Music Composer Markus Franz [ITCH] - Programmer Moorkiplier - 3D artist
